page.title: 09DIPTFORD POST AND PHONES
page.content: Nearly every house in the village of Diptford has a {telephone.}The telephone is probably the most used communication system in the Diptford area.Different people use the telephone for different things; some for work nd some for pleasure.In the village there is one telephone box which is by the {Post Office.}The call costs 1Op for approximately 2 minutes.In the box are telephone directories.Written messages are posted.There is 1 postbox in Diptford,by the Post Office.There are two classes of post- first class is 17p and 2nd class 13p.The postman comes every day except Sunday.There is no collection on Bank Holidays.People use the postal system for {letters,} postcards and parcels.Our Post Office provides a full counter service and is a very busy place.
